name: RetroSpecter Zardy (Real One)
description:
This is the real Retrospecter Zardy from the game Friday Night Funkin'

Warning!: This mod contains flashing lights and other visual effects, if you have epilepsy please do not play this mod, thanks.

Hope you all enjoy!

Note: I am not the original owner or creator of this mod, I have just upload this mod I've played before myself.
